comments.comment:
chorus (maybe)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v2 c1 v2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Moving past the brazen altar
Passing through the holy place
Enter in before His presence
See the glory of His face

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Precious servants of the temple
Cease your busy-ness and toil
Come fulfill your deepest ministry
Come and satisfy Your Lord

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Stand in awe (Stand in awe)
Worship Him (Worship Him)
Open up your hearts exclusively to Him
